name: Supabase Tool
semantic_context: Add, get, delete and update data in a table
natural_language_description: 这是 Supabase Tool 节点。主要用于: Add, get, delete and update data in a table

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.default: Add, get, delete and update data in a table
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Add, get, delete and update data in a table | (必填项)

useCustomSchema.name: useCustomSchema
useCustomSchema.description: Whether to use a database schema different from the default "public" schema (requires schema exposure in the Supabase API)
useCustomSchema.natural_language_description: 参数名: Use Custom Schema | 作用: Whether to use a database schema different from the default "public" schema (requires schema exposure in the Supabase API) | 默认值: False

schema.name: schema
schema.description: Name of database schema to use for table
schema.natural_language_description: 参数名: Schema | 作用: Name of database schema to use for table | 默认值: public

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: row

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: create
available_options: Create (值: create) - Create a new row
Get Many (值: getAll) - Get many rows

tableId.name: tableId
tableId.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
tableId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Table Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression | (必填项)

filterType.name: filterType
filterType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filter | 默认值: manual

matchType.name: matchType
matchType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Must Match | 默认值: anyFilter

filters.name: filters
filters.description: Filter to decide which rows get retrieved
filters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 作用: Filter to decide which rows get retrieved | 默认值: {}

jsonNotice.displayName: See PostgREST guide to creating filters
jsonNotice.name: jsonNotice
jsonNotice.natural_language_description: 参数名: See PostgREST guide to creating filters

dataToSend.name: dataToSend
dataToSend.natural_language_description: 参数名: Data to Send | 默认值: defineBelow
available_options: Auto-Map Input Data to Columns (值: autoMapInputData) - Use when node input properties match destination column names
Define Below for Each Column (值: defineBelow) - Set the value for each destination column

inputsToIgnore.name: inputsToIgnore
inputsToIgnore.description: List of input properties to avoid sending, separated by commas. Leave empty to send all properties.
inputsToIgnore.natural_language_description: 参数名: Inputs to Ignore | 作用: List of input properties to avoid sending, separated by commas. Leave empty to send all properties.

fieldsUi.name: fieldsUi
fieldsUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Fields to Send | 默认值: {}

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 50
